title: Alpine harvest
creator_credit: Cambridge Film Productions and David Bilcock
brief_description: A film of the timber industry in the mountainous areas of North-Eastern Victoria. Experts move through the forest, selecting trees to be felled. Then gangs of timber getters move in, felling them, hauling them to the roads, and transporting them to mills.
